title: Trump: We Are With Vegas '100%'
description:
(4 Oct 2017) U.S. President Donald Trump met privately with victims of the shooting at a Las Vegas hospital Wednesday.
"It makes you proud to be an American," Trump told reporters.
He said the nation was with Las Vegas 100 percent and said now was not the time to talk about gun control measures.
As he walked away, Trump said he had confidence in Secretary of State Rex Tillerson.
